Comment: Local dev defaults: UseDevelopmentStorage=true requires Azurite running. STORAGE_CONNECTION_STRING is used for both Azure Blob Storage AND Azure Table Storage (Phase 2 sessions). USE_STRUCTURED_OUTPUT=1 enables experimental JSON structured responses (see STRUCTURED_RESPONSE_SCHEMA.md). Wave 0 flags: CV_EXECUTION_LATCH=1 prevents duplicate PDF generation (returns cached bytes from blob), CV_SINGLE_CALL_EXECUTION=1 limits execution phase to 1 OpenAI call (enforced via stage-gated tool exposure and execution_mode), CV_BATCH_WRITES=1 reduces session writes, CV_METADATA_TO_BLOB=1 stores large metadata in blob storage. PDF generation tools (generate_cv_from_session, get_pdf_by_ref) are only exposed when stage=generate_pdf or fix_validation.
